alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 15 at 7:18PM EST until December 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...2 to 4 feet inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the beaches, Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the beaches, Pamlico Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks, and Ocracoke Island. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Up to 2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Minor to locally moderate ocean overwash possible, especially south of Oregon Inlet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Initially flooding is expected on the oceanside Sunday, then likely transitioning to the soundside Sunday night and Monday as the winds shift with potential for rapid water level rises. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/09 PM 1.1 0.5 0.7 1 None 16/10 AM 1.4 0.8 0.7 1 None 16/10 PM 1.0 0.4 0.6 1 None 17/11 AM 1.5 0.9 0.9 2-3 None 18/11 AM 3.6 3.0 3.1 2 Minor Coast Guard Hatteras NC MLLW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 4.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/09 PM 0.7 -0.5 0.2 1 None 16/09 AM 0.9 -0.3 0.1 1 None 16/09 PM 0.6 -0.6 0.1 1-2 None 17/10 AM 0.2 -1.0 -0.6 2-3 None 18/12 PM 2.5 1.3 1.7 3-4 Minor &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
